description:
Job Title: Data Analyst

Location: Los Angeles, CA (Remote/Onsite)

Duration: 6 Months Contract

Only GC, GC EAD, H4 EAD or US Citizens

  • Work closely with business partners and stakeholders to understand business processes and build data models that have integrity and align with business needs.
  • Engage with stakeholders in gathering requirements, facilitating discussions, providing insights, executing rollout plans, and clearly articulating complex issues/ risks/ concepts to meet SLA.
  • Highlight problem statements and draw attention to areas of improvement to business stakeholders.
  • Recommend action plans for improvement.
  • Applying various analytic techniques (regression, forecasting, etc.)
  • Evolve metrics and support reporting automation and visualization across all departments.
  • They should be fully familiar with both UI (front end) and Backend. No exceptions.
  • Must be very strong with SQL, Technical documentation, creating architecture diagrams and process flows.
  • Should be able to drive requirements gathering sessions and help developers with their development tasks.
  • Must be experienced with one or more of the below Health Care systems.
  • QNXT
  • CCA
  • QNXT UM
  • EDIFECS
